title: Pure and Whole - Pudong
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian
description: Its 2nd outlet, located in the basement of Kerry Parkside Center mall at the end of line 7. Western-style vegetarian cafe serving a variety of salads, wraps, veg burgers, pasta, plus smoothies and cleansing drinks.
streetAddress: 1378 Huamu Rd, Kerry Parkside Center, B111
